sensortoolkit._reference.load_ref_data.Load_Ref_DataFrames¶

Load_Ref_DataFrames(sensor_df_list, path=None, sensor_params=None)[source]¶

Load reference data for the parameters measured by the sensors in the passed sensor dataframe list and for the timeframe indicated by sensor dataset timestamps.

Parameters

  • sensor_df_list (list) – List of sensor dataframes.

  • path (str) – Full directory path to reference data.

  • sensor_params (set) – A unique listing of parameters measured by the sensor make and model being evaluated.

Returns

Dictionary containing reference datasets organized by parameter classification (keys).

Return type

ref_dict (dict)

sensortoolkit
